greatMindsCards.name: Chairman
greatMindsCards.charDescription: Sure I can buy more land in Stranmillis

greatMindsCards.name: Counselor
greatMindsCards.charDescription: If you want to get better, you would have already

greatMindsCards.name: Ada Lovelace
greatMindsCards.charDescription: That brain of mine is something more than merely mortal

greatMindsCards.name: Alan Turing
greatMindsCards.charDescription: Machines take me by surprise with great frequency

greatMindsCards.name: Albert Einstein
greatMindsCards.charDescription: Education remains when school is forgotten

greatMindsCards.name: Benjamin Franklin
greatMindsCards.charDescription: You may delay but time will not

evilLeaderCards.name: Chairman
evilLeaderCards.charDescription: Sure I can buy more land in Stranmillis

evilLeaderCards.name: Counselor
evilLeaderCards.charDescription: If you want to get better, you would have already

evilLeaderCards.name: Al Capone
evilLeaderCards.charDescription: I am like any other man. All I do is supply demand

evilLeaderCards.name: Alexander The Great
evilLeaderCards.charDescription: There is nothing impossible to him who will try

evilLeaderCards.name: Atilla The Hun
evilLeaderCards.charDescription: Trample the weak, Hurdle the dead

evilLeaderCards.name: Emperor Hirohito
evilLeaderCards.charDescription: When and where are you ever going to put up a good fight
